name: Founder Of Nations
description:
Fight, explorer, build, and conquer! In Founder of Nations, you have the full experience of being Isekaied into a 2D world. In this world, you have the freedom to do just about anything. Want to grind hordes of mobs? You can do it. Want a peaceful life tending to crops? You can do it. Want to manage a village and expand it into an empire? You can do it. In the open world you can explorer to the very farthest lands at the edge of infinity. This is your story, your life, and your adventure.

PSP Controls:

Analog Move
L/R Trigger Rotate
CROSS - Hit
SQUARE - Use
TRIANGLE - Inventory
START - SAVE
